member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext
member.summary: Context from the Cloud Trace Header.
member.remarks: A trace can be forced by passing information along in the trace header ("X-Cloud-Trace-Context"). The trace id, parent span id and whether or not to trace can be set. See: https://cloud.google.com/trace/docs/faq#how_do_i_force_a_request_to_be_traced

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.InvalidTraceHeaderContext
member.summary: An TraceHeaderContext representing no information or invalid information from a header.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.TraceHeader
member.summary: The trace header.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.TraceHeaderRegex
member.summary: A regex to match the trace header. - ([A-Fa-f0-9]{32}): The trace id, a 32 character hex value. - ([0-9]+): The span id, a 64 bit integer. - (o=([0-3])): The trace mask, 1-3 denote it should be traced.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.TraceId
member.summary: Gets the trace id or null if none is available.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.SpanId
member.summary: Gets the span id or null if none is available.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.ShouldTrace
member.summary: True if the request should be traced, false if it should not be. Null if the trace header does not indicate whether or not it should be traced.

member.summary: Creates a from a trace and span id.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.FromHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a from a header.
member.param: The string value of the trace header. See: https://cloud.google.com/trace/docs/faq

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderContext.ToString
member.summary: Gets the as a string. Formatted as "[trace-id]/[span-id];o=[should-trace]" where "should-trace" is 1 to trace and 0 otherwise.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderPropagatingHandler
member.summary: Traces outgoing HTTP requests and propagates the trace header.
member.remarks: Ensures the trace header is propagated in the headers for outgoing HTTP requests and traces the total time of the outgoing HTTP request. This is only done if tracing is initialized and tracing is enabled for the request current request.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderPropagatingHandler.Create(Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.IManagedTracer,System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler)
member.summary: Gets a .
member.param: The tracer to trace with. Cannot be null.
Optional message handler. If non is set an will be used.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Diagnostics.Common.TraceHeaderPropagatingHandler.SendAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends the given request. If tracing is initialized and enabled the outgoing request is traced and the trace header is added to the request.
